column4: does anyone know if i will have problems with a dell mini 10v/1011 and how do i find out if it is a 32 bit computer or 64 bit if i wont load through the windows logo
all works on my Dell Mini10
yes -- you need the STA driver.  Install with a wired connection, reboot, and run the add'l drivers applet.  Yes, I'm on 11.04
